scripts.preinstall: node-gyp configure && mkdir deps && cd deps && curl 'https://nodeload.github.com/fletcher/peg-multimarkdown/tar.gz/3.7' | tar zxvf - && mv peg-multimarkdown-* peg-multimarkdown && cd peg-multimarkdown && CFLAGS='-fPIC -Wall -O3 -include GLibFacade.h -I ./ -D MD_USE_GET_OPT=1 -D_GNU_SOURCE' make && cd ../../ && node-gyp build
